p: To investigate antioxidant potential of methanol extracts of three species of Acantholimon, the intracellular ROS levels were measured in control, H 2O 2-treated and H 2O 2-treated cells incubated with different concentrations of the plant extracts. As shown in Figure 5, exposure of NCCIT cells to H 2O 2 (200 ÂµM) led to an increase in the fluorescent intensity (33-fold) as compared to the control cells which showed production of ROS by H 2O 2.
